title: I also like movie bloopers.
content:

title: Re: I also like movie bloopers.

title: Re: I also like movie bloopers.
content: And you made an entire topic to tell us this... why, exactly? If you actually had any original and interesting movie bloopers to put here (ie ones that weren't freely available on the web) then perhaps this wouldn't be a waste of space. Please learn to control your posting, or the admins will put a post restriction on you like they did with Fleex. (Hopefully they will...)

title: Re: I also like movie bloopers.
content:
